response_text: Here are top speech-to-text solutions — from consumer apps to enterprise APIs — across different needs:  Best for General Use / Productivity  Otter.ai – real-time transcription, speaker identification, meeting summaries. Sonix [https://sonix.ai/resources/best-transcription-apps-for-speech-to-text/]  Google Docs Voice Typing – free built-into Google Docs for simple dictation. The Write Practice [https://thewritepractice.com/speech-to-text-apps-for-write/]  Speechnotes – browser-based free speech-to-text with voice commands. Free Speech Transcription [https://speechnotes.co/]  Wispr Flow – cross-platform dictation into any app. Wispr Flow [https://wisprflow.ai/]  Best for Professional / Accurate Transcription  Sonix – top accuracy and multilingual support, great for podcasts/interviews. Sonix [https://sonix.ai/resources/best-transcription-apps-for-speech-to-text/]  Rev (AI + optional human) – combines AI speed with human accuracy. Sonix [https://sonix.ai/resources/best-transcription-apps-for-speech-to-text/]  Fireflies.ai – meeting transcription with insights. Sonix [https://sonix.ai/resources/best-transcription-apps-for-speech-to-text/]  Enterprise / Developer APIs  Google Cloud Speech-to-Text – scalable, broad language support, strong accuracy. Google Cloud [https://cloud.google.com/speech-to-text]  Microsoft Azure Speech to Text – enterprise features and custom models. NextLevel [https://nextlevel.ai/best-speech-to-text-models/]  Amazon Transcribe – live and batch transcription with timestamps & speaker labeling. Sybill [https://www.sybill.ai/blogs/speech-to-text-software]  OpenAI Whisper (API or open-source) – powerful open-source model for developers. Voice Writer [https://voicewriter.io/blog/best-speech-recognition-api-2025]  Deepgram – low-latency real-time transcription for apps. Voice Writer [https://voicewriter.io/blog/best-speech-recognition-api-2025]  Legacy / Specialized Tools  Dragon Professional / Dragon Anywhere – long-time leader in dictation, high accuracy for writers/professionals. TechRadar [https://www.techradar.com/best/dictation-software]  Speechmatics – strong multilingual, low-latency transcription for enterprise. Speechmatics [https://www.speechmatics.com/]  Notes:  Accuracy varies by audio quality, accents, noise, and domain-specific terms. AssemblyAI [https://www.assemblyai.com/blog/how-accurate-speech-to-text]  API choices matter for developers; app choices matter for end-users. reverieinc.com [https://reverieinc.com/blog/speech-text-api-comparison/]  If you want recommendations by specific use case (meetings, podcasts, coding, healthcare, etc.), say so.
